Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
conceptualize \conceptualize\ v. t. 1. to to form a concept of; as, He could not conceptualize a robot that would help paralyzed patients.
Syn: conceive, conceive of, conceptualise, ideate. [WordNet 1.5]
conceptualize v : have the idea for; "He conceived of a robot that would help paralyzed patients"; "This library was well conceived" [syn: {gestate}, {conceive}, {conceptualise}]
